column4: Hi i have a question. i had PentumIII with ubuntu breezy. Now i have AMD Semprom 3000+ with K8ns ( GigaByte ). The ubuntu breezy 32 or 64 version ever crash in gdm. But drapper 64 with acpi=off works correctly. My question is: Its posible use ubuntu drapper 32 with micro 64?
yes i known, but under my new hardware, the brezzy ever crash ( 32 and 64 version )
Question: Its posble install ubuntu version 5.10 or 6.04 32 bits under micro AMD Semprom ( its x64_86 )
rrr i think its my mother board
ever crash in gdm with brezzy with version 32 and 64
rock solid on the athlon using breezy
i also installed breezy on an compaq with a sempron 2800 i think? he says it's still running great
what was the exact problem?
what was the error?
have you tried boot paramaters, like noapic, noacpi ?
what freezes, exactly? mouse and keyboard? can you F2 to another tty?
you can't ctrl+alt F2?
hard to say what to try next other than trying boot options
what video card?
when you run knoppix do an lsmod and find out what it loads for drivers?
the system crash if you just boot to commandline. NO gdm no gnome???
at what point does it crash from text mode?
have you done a memtest on it?
sorry man, don't know what to say, except load the modules that work in dapper or knoppix
good luck
you english is fine
